imdb.title: Sakigake!! Cromartie Kôkô
imdb.plot: A satire comedy of a misfit high school with punks, robots, gorillas and much more.

episodes.title: I Used to be a Bad Boy Bragging Contest
episodes.plot: Introduction of the delinquents in the first day at school.

episodes.title: Blade Runners High
episodes.plot: 1st year class- 5- the most notorious delinquent Mechazawa Shinichi , who is known to be praised by his classmates,is seemingly a robot that appears for some reason to be a very usual human being in the eyes of his classmates. .

episodes.title: Cromartie High (Co-Ed)
episodes.plot: While Takashi Kamiyama tries to recall a song title by humming it to his friends, his classmates and the rest gradually became obsessed with the title .

episodes.title: Radio Gaga
episodes.plot: Yamaguchi, Noboru. The leader of Destrade high school first year students. Plans to take down the Cromartie high school first year students and their leader Takenouchi, Yutaka .

episodes.title: Sentimental Bus
episodes.plot: Takenouchi, Yutaka; the leader of the first year students of Cromartie school. Known as a reliable delinquent and by his incredible ability to fight that has no match. However, he has a very serious weakness point , he has a phobia from riding buses or caps and gets emotionally sick constantly which affect him alongside his crew when it comes to help their friend Maeda, Akira who got kidnapped by Bass high school delinquents.

episodes.title: The Empire of Ambition
episodes.plot: Hokuto, Takeshis; the son of board chairman of several high schools in Japan, uses his father's name and power to rule the schools he transfers to. Until one day he ran cross Cromatie high school .

episodes.title: Pootan
episodes.plot: It's the day of medical and physical examination, and the doctor seems to be going through hard times keeping up with the odd situations that taking place in Cromatie school medical room. The first year students are having fun at Maeda's house by celebrating random birthday parties and persistent efforts of seeking the most convenient solution to prove the strongest delinquent among them.

episodes.title: Electric Warrior
episodes.plot: It's Maeda's birthday and everyone is gathering to attend at it's house. Meanwhile, Mechazawa introduces his little brother to his classmates .

episodes.title: Reboot
episodes.plot: Setouchi, Jackson; the leader of first year students of Bass high school .Plotting with Takejou, Akio his right-hand guy alongside his classmates who are normally receiving the orders directly from Takejuo himself, decided finally to kidnap Maeda as a hostage to lure his classmates. However, weird events started taking place.

episodes.title: Jackson
episodes.plot: Two thieves discussing priority whether to steal a plan or to turn back taking into account the plan included the first year Cromatie students and their boss .

episodes.title: USA Trip
episodes.plot: Mechazawa is inquired by his classmates to help them in settling down quarrel with their rivals of Bass high school, he refuses. Meanwhile Freddie stares at a front of musical instruments store in craving.

episodes.title: Road Safety
episodes.plot: Maeda with his friends have founded the baseball team of Cromatie high school students. Weird events are taking place at the match .

episodes.title: Joshua Tree
episodes.plot: Cro-School's delinquents gathered to make a baseball team players.

episodes.title: Talking Head
episodes.plot: Back again to Destrade school, the boss Yamaguchi finally thinks it's time to choose his second man.

episodes.title: OK Computer
episodes.plot: Fujimoto, Kiichi; the leader of Manuel high school first year students, a very aggressive guy who picks fights mainly in streets. However, the man is completely the reverse at home as a very polite and a nice person on the internet. Meanwhile at Cromatie school Kamiyama tries to explain to his classmates why is being late at morning classes is unacceptable.

episodes.title: Japan Boss Championships
episodes.plot: A tournament is held once every year in Japan consists of considerable schools of the worst students in the country and represents only the strongest delinquent in the competition.

episodes.title: Let Me Tell You My Name
episodes.plot: Hokuto's Henchman; his classmates seem careless to know his name and normally referring to him as "you" or the "the other guy", when trying to say his name every time odd events occur.

episodes.title: Pootan Gets Fired
episodes.plot: Freddie subs for Poo-tan at an autograph signing session, and ends up becoming Poo-tan in truth, while the real Poo-tan becomes distraught.

episodes.title: Moto-Mechazawa
episodes.plot: Mechazawa may have a new body, but he won't let that slow him down. Literally, he won't, as he speeds by legendary bikers and Maedas alike!

episodes.title: Lost Relation
episodes.plot: Kamiyama tries to upgrade Mechazawa's system due to some malfunctioning recently despite the hesitation of his classmates. Meanwhile, Hakuto finds his butler and Meada ridiculously identical and starts to suspect a family connection between them.

episodes.title: A Trip for Heart
episodes.plot: The boys from Cromartie take a bullet train to Kyoto for a school trip, but whether they will actually get there or not is another matter.

episodes.title: You Never Give Me Your Name
episodes.plot: Hokuto's lackey gets fed up with Hokuto and decides to leave the group. But Hayashida thinks that's a mistake, because then what would they call him?

episodes.title: Stone Cold Crazy
episodes.plot: Kamiyama declines an invitation for a meal, and Hayashida calls him out on having changed. Though the Cromartie boys aren't smart, Kamiyama does his best to explain human psychology.

episodes.title: Gorilla Sushi
episodes.plot: Gorilla works at a sushi restaurant, and helps the chief chef and his son reconcile their differences in a way only a gorilla can.

episodes.title: A Hole in Lotta Love
episodes.plot: Freddie's horse Kokuryu goes on a rampage, which prompts the Cromartie boys to think about pets. After, they lose interest and make Maeda do all the work.

episodes.title: Suda!! Cromartie Girls Highschool
episodes.plot: Welcome to Cromartie Girls High School, where the students are all competing to be the prettiest princess.
